title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green cut and uncut velvet on a tan ground originally heavily shot through with fine strips of flat metal. Design of small flowering branches in horizontal rows turning alternately left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-28.
